title: 服务端报错问题
author: Ultra_Greedier
txt_content:
1.14.4mod服，无插件，控制台会显示这种错误，但能正常进行游戏，有偶发性掉线，但不影响体验。
控制台信息：[12:08:11] [Netty Server IO #14/ERROR] [minecraft/ArgumentTypes]:Could not serialize 
net.minecraftforge.server.command.ModIdArgument@8cd51a2 (class 
net.minecraftforge.server.command.ModIdArgument) - will not be sent to client!
[12:08:11] [Netty Server IO #14/ERROR] [minecraft/ArgumentTypes]:Could not serialize 
net.minecraftforge.server.command.EnumArgument@20645428 (class 


net.minecraftforge.server.command.EnumArgument) - will not be sent to client!


[12:08:11] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.mi.fm.ne.si.IndexedMessageCodec/SIMPLENET]:Received empty 
payload on channel fml:handshake


[12:08:13] [Server thread/ERROR] [ne.mi.fm.ne.si.IndexedMessageCodec/SIMPLENET]:Received empty 


payload on channel fml:handshake

replies.author: 棱海
replies.txt_content:
不影响玩家体验的话，可以选择不理，当然，为了后台美观
可以加入报错不显示插件
理论全版本： https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-598149-1-1.html

replies.author: Ultra_Greedier
replies.txt_content:
棱海 发表于 2020-2-1 12:44

可以加入报错不显示插件
